    • all Strikes have the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body.name: Spell Effect: Fiery Body
Spell Effect: Fiery Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.

Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet and don't need to breathe.

Heightened (9th) Creatures touching you take @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage instead of 3d6, your unarmed attacks deal 2d4 additional fire damage, and you have a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).name: Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level)
Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage. Your unarmed attacks deal 2d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1. In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 60 feet and don't need to breathe.

Spell Effect: Fire Shield.name: Spell Effect: Fire Shield
Spell Effect: Fire Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}

The target gains resistance to cold damage.

Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.name: Spell Effect: Flame Dancer
Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.p6ebe2PliRkGbmiV]{Flame Dancer}

The target's unarmed Strikes deal additional fire damage. Critical hits with these Strikes also deal persistent fire damage.

Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.name: Spell Effect: Flame Wisp
Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.description:
Three faintly glowing wisps of fire float around your head. Each time you hit a creature with a Strike, one of the wisps goes hurtling towards that creature, dealing 1d4 fire damage. If you Cast a Spell with the fire trait while you have fewer than three wisps, a new wisp appears.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d4.

Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.name: Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance
Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YgbYvkLvnWJ4WfEA]{Flashy Disappearance}

You create a puff of colorful smoke that quickly disperses while you become temporarily invisible. You become undetected to all creatures unless they can see invisible creatures. You Stride. At the end of your movement, if you have cover, greater cover, or concealment, attempt a Stealth check to Hide. You gain a +2 status bonus to this Stealth check. The invisibility then ends, and you either become observed or hidden to creatures as determined by your check to Hide, if you made one.

Spell Effect: Fleet Step.name: Spell Effect: Fleet Step
Spell Effect: Fleet Step.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}

You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Fly.name: Spell Effect: Fly
Spell Effect: Fly.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}

The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.name: Spell Effect: Font of Serenity
Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yY1H5zhO5dHmD8lz]{Font of Serenity}.

Allies within the area gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Heightened (+4) The bonus increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.name: Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward
Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}.

You are warded against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. You gain a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

0.label: Attacked by target of Forbidding Ward

Spell Effect: Foresight.name: Spell Effect: Foresight
Spell Effect: Foresight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight}

While foresight is in effect, the target gains a +2 status bonus to initiative rolls and isn't off-guard against undetected creatures or when flanked.

Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure).name: Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Forge (Critical Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FTR8m4qrhYzTRyrD]{Forge}

A metal creature that critically fails its fortitude saving throw against Forge gains weakness 2 * spell rank to physical damage until the end of the caster's next turn.

Spell Effect: Frostbite.name: Spell Effect: Frostbite
Spell Effect: Frostbite.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IxhGEKl63R4QBvkj]{Frostbite}

The target gains weakness to bludgeoning equal to the spell rank.

Spell Effect: Fungal Infestation.name: Spell Effect: Fungal Infestation
Spell Effect: Fungal Infestation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3VxVbZqIRvpKkg3O]{Fungal Infestation}

The target has weakness to fire and weakness to slashing.

Spell Effect: Garden of Death (Critical.name: Spell Effect: Garden of Death (Critical Success)
Spell Effect: Garden of Death (Critical.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nEXkk85BQu1cREa4]{Garden of Death}

A poisonous garden forms, and you and the secondary casters gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature or Crafting checks to deal with the plants or animals, such as feeding them or harvesting poison from them.

Spell Effect: Gecko Grip.name: Spell Effect: Gecko Grip
Spell Effect: Gecko Grip.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5KobTMrZeZxuXMgl]{Gecko Grip}

The target gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed.

Spell Effect: Ghostly Shift.name: Spell Effect: Ghostly Shift
Spell Effect: Ghostly Shift.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JqHAxsMUZ4Mr5bTr]{Ghostly Shift}

You gain resistance 2 to all damage (except force).

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Ghostly Weapon.name: Spell Effect: Ghostly Weapon
Spell Effect: Ghostly Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AMEu5zzLN7uCX645]{Ghostly Weapon}

The weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune and becomes magical if it wasn't already.

Spell Effect: Girzanje's March.name: Spell Effect: Girzanje's March
Spell Effect: Girzanje's March.description:
Granted by Girzanje's March

Allied creatures who can hear and understand you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Fortitude saves, and Will saves against mental effects.

Heightened (7th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Heightened (10th) The status bonus increases to +3.

Spell Effect: Glass Shield.name: Spell Effect: Glass Shield
Spell Effect: Glass Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cgfl9Qr46bKaA59e]{Glass Shield}

You summon a layer of clear glass to keep you from harm.

Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness.name: Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness
Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cNnHV97gPqxJ3Rrr]{Glimpse Weakness}

You deal additional precision damage equal to 1 + this spell's rank, and then the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaw.name: Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaw
Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaw.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SdXFiQ4Py8761sNO]{Glutton's Jaw}

Your mouth transforms into a shadowy maw bristling with pointed teeth. These jaws are an unarmed attack with the forceful trait dealing 1d8 piercing damage. If you hit with your jaws and deal damage, you gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Goodberry.name: Spell Effect: Goodberry
Spell Effect: Goodberry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQuwLqtFFYt0K15N]{Cornucopia}.

You are holding one or more goodberries, which remain fresh for the duration of the spell.

You can consume one or more goodberries from the same casting with an Interact action to regain 1d6+4 Hit Points per goodberry.

Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.name: Spell Effect: Gray Shadow
Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.description: The greater shadow's shadow hand Strike deals an additional 1d8 poison damage.

Spell Effect: Guidance.name: Spell Effect: Guidance
Spell Effect: Guidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}

You have divine guidance, granting you a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you attempt before the duration ends. You choose which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If you use the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, you are then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.name: Spell Effect: Guided Introspection
Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.description:
The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against emotion and fear.

Heightened (+3) The status bonus increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.name: Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground
Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4bFxUA59xeq6Snhw]{Hallowed Ground}

Undead creatures have weakness to vitality damage while in the area.

Spell Effect: Haste.name: Spell Effect: Haste
Spell Effect: Haste.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}

The target gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing.name: Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing
Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rhJyqB9g3ziImQgM]{Healer's Blessing}

When the target regains Hit Points from a healing vitality spell, it regains 2 additional Hit Points. The target regains additional Hit Points from healer's blessing only the first time it regains HP from a given healing spell, so a spell that heals the creature repeatedly over a duration would restore additional Hit Points only once.

Spell Effect: Heroes' Feast.name: Spell Effect: Heroes' Feast
Spell Effect: Heroes' Feast.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yRf59eFtZ50cGlem]{Heroes' Feast}

Each guest gains temporary Hit Points. On a critical success, guests also gain a +2 status bonus to saves against disease, fear, and poison effects.

Spell Effect: Heroism.name: Spell Effect: Heroism
Spell Effect: Heroism.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}

Tapping into your inner heroism, you get a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.name: Spell Effect: Hidden Mind
Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.description: Powerful wards hide a creature from magic that would spy on it or affect its mind. The target gains a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects. Hidden mind attempts to counteract any detection, revelation, and scrying effects as if its spell rank were 1 higher than its actual rank. On a success, the effect functions normally except that it detects nothing about the target and its possessions. For instance, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on the target.

Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.name: Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing
Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gSUQlTDYoLDGAsCP]{Hymn of Healing}

The target gains fast healing. When you Cast the Spell and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, the target gains temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Hyperfocus.name: Spell Effect: Hyperfocus
Spell Effect: Hyperfocus.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XhgMx9WC6NfXd9RP]{Hyperfocus}.

The target gains a +1 status bonus to Perception checks attempted with any of its precise senses.

Spell Effect: Ill Omen.name: Spell Effect: Ill Omen
Spell Effect: Ill Omen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]{Ill Omen}

Failure The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Critical Failure Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.name: Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise
Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}

The target receives a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through the disguise, and lets the target add its level to such Deception checks even if untrained.

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.name: Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{Impeccable Flow}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical.name: Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical Failure Effect)
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical.description:
Granted by critically failing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{Impeccable Flow}

You attune yourself to an underlying cosmic order to the world. While you remain in tune with this power, you gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks. If you critically fail any check while under the effects of this spell, the bonus ends and you instead have a -1 status penalty to all checks for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure)
Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure).description:
Granted @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OTd17oXwJH9qb1cS]{Incendiary Ashes}

The creature has weakness to fire 3 for 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success).name: Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success)
Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success).description:
Granted @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OTd17oXwJH9qb1cS]{Incendiary Ashes}

The creature has weakness to fire 3 until the start of its next turn.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura.name: Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura
Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura}

Each time a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking [[/r (ceil(@item.level/2)+1)d4[persistent,fire]]] damage.

Spell Effect: Infectious Melody.name: Spell Effect: Infectious Melody
Spell Effect: Infectious Melody.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}

Success For 1 round, the creature can communicate only by singing along to the melody. It can speak only on its turn, and it must take the Perform action when it does. The result of the Performance check determines how well it sang, but it stills communicate the information regardless of the result, which has no further mechanical impact than the time spent to take the action. A single Perform check is sufficient for any amount of speaking on the creature's turn. This effect might interfere with verbal components of spells or other linguistic abilities that rely on precise speech; in order to use such an ability successfully, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5].

In addition, the creature takes a -2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks, as singing its threats saps away some of the menace. The creature's constant humming of the tune also makes it nearly impossible for the creature to remain undetected.

Failure As success, but the duration is 3 rounds.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 hour.

Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.name: Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality
Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Infuse Vitality}.

Each target's unarmed and weapon Strikes deal extra vitality damage.

Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask.name: Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask
Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YQWq1DZuLRk32M3h]{Inscrutable Mask}

You shroud your form and features in an impenetrable mask of shadow. The mask grants you a +1 status bonus to Deception checks to Lie or Feint, Intimidation checks to Demoralize, and Stealth checks to Hide in areas of dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You envision a simple bug and transform into a Medium animal battle form. When you cast this spell, choose a form.

You can decide the specific type of animal (such as such as a ladybug or scarab for beetle), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss this spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ant
    • Speed 30 feet, climb Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d10 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Spider).description:

Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level).name: Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level)
Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb while using the guts.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.name: Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage, +2)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.description:
Granted by succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem}.

You are inspired by words or tunes of encouragement. You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.name: Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage, +3)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.description:
Granted by critically succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem}.

You are inspired by words or tunes of encouragement. You gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense,.name: Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense, +2)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense,.description:
Granted by succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Rallying Anthem}.

You inspire your allies to protect themselves more effectively. You and all allies in the area gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance equal to half the spell's rank to physical damage.

Note: resistance is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense,.name: Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense, +3)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense,.description:
Granted by critically succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Rallying Anthem}.

Note: resistance is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength,.name: Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength, +2)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength,.description:
Granted by succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}

You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Shove, and Trip.

Note: bonus to DCs is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength,.name: Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength, +3)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength,.description:
Granted by critically succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}

Note: bonus to DCs is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Instant Armor.name: Spell Effect: Instant Armor
Spell Effect: Instant Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uiv8FKuxE8HOWTxW]{Instant Armor}

You gain the Armor Up! action.

Spell Effect: Juvenile Companion.name: Spell Effect: Juvenile Companion
Spell Effect: Juvenile Companion.description: The creature becomes Tiny (if it was larger), and its reach is reduced to 0 feet. All of its Speeds are halved (to a minimum Speed of 5 feet), and it gains weakness 5 to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Ki Form.name: Spell Effect: Ki Form
Spell Effect: Ki Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YDMOqndvYFu3OjA6]{Ki Form}

Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special ki form. In your ki form, your hair, feathers, skin, or scales change color and begin to glow.

In this form you gain a Fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Choose force, lawful (only if you are lawful), negative, or vitality damage.

All your Strikes deal [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 additional damage of the chosen type}.

Your entire body is also surrounded by a glowing corona of the same color as your inner ki; this is a light effect. Your corona is a 5-foot emanation that deals @Damage[2d6[force]]{2d6 damage of the chosen type} to creatures who start their turn within the emanation. If the emanation overlaps with a darkness effect, the corona's glow attempts to counteract the darkness effect. Regardless of the outcome, the corona can't attempt to counteract that effect again for 1 day. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can flare your corona out to become a 30-foot emanation.

In your ki form, your emotions surge to the forefront and it's difficult to moderate your attacks. Your weapons and unarmed attacks lose the nonlethal trait. You take a -2 status penalty to saves against emotion effects but gain a +2 status bonus to saves against all other mental effects.

Spell Effect: Ki Strike.name: Spell Effect: Ki Strike
Spell Effect: Ki Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Ki Strike}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with the Strikes, and the Strikes deal 1d6 extra damage of the chosen type.

Heightened (+4) The extra damage increases by 1d6.

Spell Effect: Knock.name: Spell Effect: Knock
Spell Effect: Knock.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6Ot4N22t5tPD51BO]{Knock}

Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check.

Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble.name: Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble
Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against inhaled dangers.

Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble (He.name: Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble (Heightened)
Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble (He.description:
You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against inhaled dangers.

Heightened (8th) The bubble grants a +2 status bonus instead of +1.

Spell Effect: Lay on Hands.name: Spell Effect: Lay on Hands
Spell Effect: Lay on Hands.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands}

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).name: Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead)
Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands}

If the target is undead, they also gain a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Levitate.name: Spell Effect: Levitate
Spell Effect: Levitate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{Levitate}.

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls while floating in the air. You can spend an Interact action to stabilize yourself and negate this penalty for the remainder of the turn.

Spell Effect: Life Connection.name: Spell Effect: Life Connection
Spell Effect: Life Connection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HIY4XUJZKmFLAJTn]{Life Connection}.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5V49l0K460CcvBOO]{Defend Life} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Life's Fresh Bloom.name: Spell Effect: Life's Fresh Bloom
Spell Effect: Life's Fresh Bloom.description: You gains a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form.name: Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form
Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9kOI14Jep97TzGO7]{Life-Giving Form}

Your body exudes bright light like a torch. You gain resistance to precision damage and weakness to void damage, and your unarmed Strikes deal extra vitality damage.

Spell Effect: Lift Nature's Caul (Bonus).name: Spell Effect: Lift Nature's Caul (Bonus)
Spell Effect: Lift Nature's Caul (Bonus).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6GjJtLJnwC18Y0aZ]{Lift Nature's Caul}

The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws and attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Light.name: Spell Effect: Light
Spell Effect: Light.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}

You attach an orb of light to a willing creature, causing it to float near that creature as it moves.

Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity.name: Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity
Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tYP8unoR0a5Dq9EA]{Litany of Depravity}.

You gain weakness 7 to unholy.

Heightened (+1) The weakness increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness.name: Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness
Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.n3b3pDmA6L5YRTyq]{Litany of Righteousness}.

You gain weakness 7 to holy.

Heightened (+1) The weakness increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest.name: Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest
Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest.description: Granted by failing the save against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mm3hZ6jgaJaKK16n]{Litany of Self-Interest}

Spell Effect: Lucky Number.name: Spell Effect: Lucky Number
Spell Effect: Lucky Number.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rDDYGY2ekZ1yVv7q]{Lucky Number}.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kUME7DMhhHH6eIiH]{That's My Number} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Magic Stone.name: Spell Effect: Magic Stone
Spell Effect: Magic Stone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9u6X9ykhzG11NK1n]{Magic Stone}

The stones become +1 striking disrupting sling bullets.

Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel.name: Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel
Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.u4FGIUQgruLjml7J]{Magic's Vessel}

The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws.

Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel (Resistance.name: Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel (Resistance)
Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel (Resistance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.u4FGIUQgruLjml7J]{Magic's Vessel}

The target gains resistance to damage from spells equal to the spell's rank.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Ice Glide)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Ice Glide Ice trails from your feet for an instant as you move, allowing you to skate rapidly along the ice. You don't need to Balance on ice, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by ice or snow. While moving along a smooth surface, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Icy Claws)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Icy Claws Your hands morph into vicious, piercing claws of ice useful for attacking or climbing. As long as you have both hands free, you gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile and finesse traits, in the brawling weapon group. Your claw attack deals 1d6 piercing damage as its base damage, plus an additional 2d6 cold damage.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Enlarging Eruption)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Enlarging Eruption You erupt in lava, which clings to you and hardens, causing your body to swell and burst until you grow to size Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. You can't choose this option if you're already Large or larger.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Fiery Grasp)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Fiery Grasp Your hands swell and grow with lava. You gain a lava fist unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group. Your lava fists deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage as their base damage, plus an additional 2d6 fire damage and 1d6 persistent fire damage.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering H.name: Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering Heart
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering H.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3526YUgCvB5ZsKuX]{Mantle of the Unwavering Heart}

  • Evergreen Vitality You gain fast healing 3 and a +2 bonus to saves against poison and disease. This effect has the healing and vitality traits.
  • Overwhelming Perfume (aura, olfactory) A cloud of potent floral scent surrounds you in a 15-foot emanation. Creatures in the aura can't benefit from the scent ability and are sickened 1 as long as they remain in the aura. The sickness is a disease effect.
  • Towering Trunk You grow to a considerable height. Increase your size to Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a grasping branch unarmed attack; this attack is in the brawling weapon group and deals 2d8 bludgeoning damage plus Grab.
  • Unyielding Will Your mind becomes incredibly resilient to change. You're immune to being fascinated, and you get a +1 bonus to saves and DCs against mental effects.

Spell Effect: Mimic Undead.name: Spell Effect: Mimic Undead
Spell Effect: Mimic Undead.description: You take death and wrap it about you like a cloak-your colors wash out and your skin grows cold to the touch. Your heartbeat, breathing, and similar life functions become very difficult to detect. Senses such as lifesense detect you as undead unless a creature succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC, and on a failed check, they don't detect you at all if they only sense living creatures. Detection spells that specifically sense living creatures must succeed at a counteract check against mimic undead to detect you. You gain a +4 status bonus to Impersonate an undead but physically intact version of yourself and can add your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained. You don't gain these benefits to Impersonate any other sort of undead. Mindless undead usually don't have a reason to even attempt the Perception check to notice your Impersonation unless you interact with them in some way.

Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Succes.name: Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Success)
Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Succes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RWwiFnjxoJXn7H6D]{Mind Swap}

The mind swap is unusually smooth, and the targets gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate each other.

1.label: Impersonate the Other Target of Mind Swap

Spell Effect: Mirecloak.name: Spell Effect: Mirecloak
Spell Effect: Mirecloak.description: You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers. The shroud settles about each target's shoulders, granting a +1 status bonus to AC and a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks, both only while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Mirror Image.name: Spell Effect: Mirror Image
Spell Effect: Mirror Image.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}

Three illusory images of you swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on [[/r 1d4]]). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1-2 on [[/r 1d6]]). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (1-3 on [[/r 1d6]]).

Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Wor.name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Worm)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Wor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Cave Worm
    • Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+15 piercing plus 2d6 persistent poison;
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet) Damage 2d8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Inexorable You automatically recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} conditions at the end of each of your turns. You're also immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju).name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1ul2dasQBdlaMEC5]{Heart of the Kaiju}

You take on a kaiju form. The battle form is Gargantuan size with the following specific abilities.

Kaiju Speed 40 feet; physical resistance 5;

Melee 1 jaws (reach 20 feet), Damage 3d12+20 piercing;

Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 20 feet), Damage 3d8+20 slashing;

Breath Weapon 2 (evocation, primal) Each creature in a 60-foot cone takes 15d6 damage (of your chosen damage type), with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for 1d4 rounds.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the beast trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Phoenix
    • Speed 30 feet, fly 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 beak (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d6+12 piercing plus 2d4 fire and 2d4 persistent fire;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 2d8+12 slashing;
    • Shroud of Flame (aura, fire, primal) 20 feet. You gain an aura of fire that extends out from you. A creature that enters or ends its turn within the aura takes @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. You can activate or deactivate this aura with a Sustain action.

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.name: Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serpent)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Sea Serpent
    • Speed 20 feet, swim 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 25 feet), Damage 2d8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Spine Rake 2 (move) You extend your spines and Swim or Stride. Each creature you're adjacent to at any point during your movement takes @Damage[(4d8+10)[slashing]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] against your spell DC).

Heightened (9th) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy.name: Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy
Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy}

Targets gain temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds, and weakness to silver. They also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks. If a target is in the light of a full moon, it also grows by one size if it were Medium or smaller. This increases the reach of a Medium or Tiny creature by 5 feet.

Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.name: Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience
Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}

The target's skin hardens like stone. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, mountain resilience's duration decreases by 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment.name: Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment
Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mnhuvqTIELcpJOFX]{Musical Accompaniment}

This music provides a +1 status bonus to Performance checks. You take a –4 penalty to Stealth checks while the music is playing.

Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.name: Spell Effect: Mystic Armor
Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mystic Armor}

You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing mystic armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.name: Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZXwxs5tRjEGrjAJT]{Nature Incarnate}

The primal power of the world flows through you. You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own is higher. You gain specific abilities based on the incarnation you choose:
  • Green Man Speed 40 feet, climb 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 vines (reach 30 feet, versatile P), Damage 6d8+12 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 thorns (range 100 feet), Damage 6d6+6 piercing;
    • Green Caress (aura, primal) 60 feet. Enemies other than plants must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).
  • Kaiju
    • Speed 50 feet; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 30 feet), Damage 6d10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage 6d8+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 6d6+10 bludgeoning;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC.

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Green Ma.name: Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Green Man)
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Green Ma.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZXwxs5tRjEGrjAJT]{Nature Incarnate}

Enemies other than plants must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Kaiju).name: Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Kaiju)
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate (Kaiju).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZXwxs5tRjEGrjAJT]{Nature Incarnate}

The primal power of the world flows through you. You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own is higher. You gain specific abilities based on the incarnation you choose:
  • Kaiju Speed 50 feet; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 30 feet), Damage 6d10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage 6d8+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 6d6+10 bludgeoning;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC.

Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.name: Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity
Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JUJYVbtNNFdvyrBS]{Necromancer's Generosity}

Your undead minion gains a +2 status bonus to saves against vitality effects for the duration.

Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs).name: Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs)
Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs).description: The target's legs necrotize, as well as any other limbs associated with forms of movement, making it harder for the creature to move. The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Spell Effect: Nudge the Odds.name: Spell Effect: Nudge the Odds
Spell Effect: Nudge the Odds.description:
You bestow yourself supernaturally good luck at cards, dice, and other games of chance. You gain a +1 status bonus to Games Lore checks to gamble, and if you roll a critical failure on such a check, you get a failure instead; however, the spell is too short-lived to use for Earn Income checks from gambling.

When you're under the effect of nudge the odds, one facial feature, such as a lock of hair or the iris of an eye, transforms to a distinctive golden color; the GM chooses which feature when you cast the spell. This change resists all magical efforts to conceal it, though it can be hidden or covered by mundane means. A creature noticing the feature can identify the spell using Recall Knowledge. Because it prevents losing big, gamblers consider nudge the odds a repugnant form of cheating. If you're caught using the spell, you are likely to suffer serious consequences, depending on the nature of the gamblers you cheated.

Heightened (5th) The status bonus increases to +2, and the duration increases to last until the next time you make your daily preparations. If you continue spending your spell slot to keep the duration active, this allows you to apply the effect to a downtime check to Earn Income.

Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.name: Spell Effect: Nymph's Token
Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.description: Granted by holding the token created by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pHrVvoTKygXeczVG]{Nymph's Token}

Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).name: Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon)
Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RztmhJrLLQWoGVdB]{Object Memory}.

If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher).

Heightened (6th) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.

Spell Effect: One with the Land.name: Spell Effect: One with the Land
Spell Effect: One with the Land.description:
You merge with an adjacent natural feature with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions, such as the ground or a large tree. Your merged form is visible within the feature, and creatures can target and attack you normally, though you have cover and can use it to Hide or Take Cover within the feature. You can cast spells while in the feature as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the feature. You can Dismiss the spell. While merged, you gain the following additional benefits.

  • You immediately become aware of the surrounding terrain features, and you gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 200 feet.
  • You can make terrain vengeance Strikes by commanding plants, rocks, and other natural features to attack your foes. These are melee Strikes that use your spell attack roll, can target any creature within 60 feet of you, and deal 5d12 @Damage[5d12[bludgeoning]]{bludgeoning}, @Damage[5d12[piercing]]{piercing}, or @Damage[5d12[slashing]]{slashing} damage. You choose the damage type each time you make a terrain vengeance Strike.
  • By spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can increase or decrease the environmental temperature changing it to either one step warmer than normal, one step colder than normal, or the normal temperature.
  • As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate trait, you can create or remove difficult terrain caused by natural terrain in a 20-foot burst within 200 feet. All of your alterations to the land end when the spell ends. Significant physical damage to the natural feature while you are inside it expels you and deals [[/r 10d6]]{10d6 damage} to you.

Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).name: Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding)
Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0gdZrT9lwO17EIxc]{Ooze Form}

You invoke all things that seep and ooze, your body dissolving into a thick slurry and then reconstituting itself into a Medium ooze battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose black pudding, gelatinous cube, gray ooze, or ochre jelly. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 7 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, and visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • No vision and motion sense 30 feet. You can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • Black Pudding Speed 15 feet, climb 15 feet;
    • Melee 1 pseudopod, Damage 2d6+5 bludgeoning and 1d8 acid.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; and Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 feet.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 and double damage dice; and Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), and your attacks have 20-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 and double damage dice; and Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (C.name: Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (Critical Success)
Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (C.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

Spell Effect: Organsight.name: Spell Effect: Organsight
Spell Effect: Organsight.description:
You see the target as though it's dissected and arrayed before you. For the duration, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a -2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

When you Cast the Spell, attempt a special Recall Knowledge check using Medicine to spot and discern a vital organ. If you have a Lore skill appropriate to the creature, you can use that skill instead of Medicine. If you succeed, the next time you deal piercing or slashing damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal 4d6 additional precision damage. Once on each of your subsequent turns, you can use a single action to attempt the special Recall Knowledge check again. The extra damage isn't cumulative, so making the check more than once before a Strike or spell has no extra benefit.

Heightened (+1) The precision damage increases by [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.name: Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise
Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.description:
You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} while in dim light or darkness.

In addition, the shadows mask the creature's features. While the creature is in dim light or darkness, other creatures must succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action against the spell's DC to discern details about the target's appearance. For example, without using Seek, other creatures can determine the target's general shape (such as humanoid), but they would need to Seek to determine the target's precise appearance or any other identifying information.

Creatures with darkvision can still see the target and their features normally. The target's normal appearance is revealed in bright light.

Heightened (4th) The status bonus is +2. Creatures with darkvision can no longer discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness without Seeking, though creatures with greater darkvision can still determine these details.

Heightened (6th) As 4th level, except the status bonus is +3 and creatures without darkvision can't determine even general details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness unless they successfully Seek the target; these creatures see a vague shadow instead. Even on a successful Seek, they only determine general features, though they can see details on a critical success.

Heightened (8th) As 6th level, except the status bonus is +4 and even creatures with greater darkvision must Seek to discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Pest Form.name: Spell Effect: Pest Form
Spell Effect: Pest Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}

You transform into the battle form of a Tiny animal, such as a cat, insect, lizard, or rat. You can decide the specific type of animal (such as a rat or praying mantis), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait and you can't make Strikes. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 15 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • Speed 20 feet.
  • Weakness 5 to physical damage. (If you take physical damage in this form, you take 5 additional damage.)
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers of +10, unless your own modifier is higher; Athletics modifier -4.

Heightened (4th) You can turn into a flying creature, such as a bird, which grants you a fly Speed of 20 feet.

Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.name: Spell Effect: Phase Familiar
Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.description: Your familiar gains resistance to all damage and is immune to precision damage.

Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.name: Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward
Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lJdAvY1sJyEmNDc6]{Phoenix Ward}

You raise a fiery shield around yourself, gaining resistance 10 to fire.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).name: Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. You must have space to expand into or the spell is lost. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Arboreal
    • Speed 30 feet; you can speak in this form, but you still can't Cast a Spell or supply verbal components.
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).name: Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Flytrap
    • Speed 15 feet; resistance 10 to acid;
    • Melee 1 leaf (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 piercing, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Shambler).description:
